reviews.review_msg: I took the course in the spring 2014. Dorota was so nice and helpful. Yes, you feel she is listening to you. I emailed her about my concern, she gave me advice and encouragement. Although it is an online course and I never have met her, I can feel her sincerity. She is a sweet person.
Sweet person. You can feel she is helping you. Answer my questions and listen to my concerns.  She is a nice person

I took this course online & really liked the way it was designed. Dorota was my TA & was very friendly & helpful. I felt like if I had any questions that she would be more than happy to answer them in a friendly, professional, and concise manner. She is a very fair marker (unlike many TAs who are on a power trip) & always gives lots of feedback.
